data.title: cuFFS: CUDA-accelerated Fast Faraday Synthesis
data.name: cuFFS
data.description: A GPU-accelerated Rotation Measure Synthesis code

evidence: Title and description indicate a domain-specific CUDA-accelerated Faraday synthesis code, implying an end-user scientific application rather than a reusable library: "CUDA-accelerated Fast Faraday Synthesis (cuFFS)"
Installation section only references building from source via a script: "See build.sh for sample compiler instruction.", with no mention of package managers or binaries.

Notes describe assumptions about scientific data formats and usage (FITS cubes, pixel values), indicating it directly processes research data: "The input cubes must have 3 axes (2 spatial dimensions and 1 frequency axis)... use the helper/makeFitsCube.py to get the data in the required format."]}```}**Note**: The extra characters after the JSON object appear to be a formatting error.
